description:
Buddy HeadsetMic 7G is a USB Plug and Play microprocessor based headset microphone with embedded FilteredAudio noise cancellation DSP technology and Event/Action architecture for fully customizable parts.
  
Made of heavy duty, highly durable materials including extra strong cable and stainless steel adjustable headband.  Boom rotates 270 degrees for left and right side wear.  Backed by 2 year warranty.

Customizable buttons can be programmed to control the microphone, speaker and software such as Dragon NaturallySpeaking software.  Simulates keyboard and mouse to send keystrokes, strings, mouse movements. MyBuddyMic customization software and BDK (Buddy Development Kit) available freely from manufacturer's web site.
 
Featuring a top of the line, highly unidirectional microphone element, this headset has been designed from the ground up with quality in mind. Package includes Buddy HeadsetMic 7G, with a replacement windsock and foam ear cushion. For a limited time we will include a Buddy Microphones Carrying Bag at NO EXTRA COST!
title: Buddy HeadsetMic 7G Mono - USB Customizable with FilteredAudio
